rpAlarmTable.name: rpAlarmTable
rpAlarmTable.description: A list of alarm entries that extends the RMON MIB.

rpAlarmEntry.name: rpAlarmEntry
rpAlarmEntry.description: A list of parameters that extends the alarm entries in RMON.

rpAlarmIndex.name: rpAlarmIndex
rpAlarmIndex.description: An index that uniquely identifies an entry in the rpAlarmTable.

rpAlarmRisingDescription.name: rpAlarmRisingDescription
rpAlarmRisingDescription.description: A description of the rising alarm.

rpAlarmFallingDescription.name: rpAlarmFallingDescription
rpAlarmFallingDescription.description: A description of the falling alarm.

rpHostTable.name: rpHostTable
rpHostTable.description: A list of host entries that extends the RMON MIB.

rpHostEntry.name: rpHostEntry
rpHostEntry.description: A collection of statistics that extend the host entries in RMON.

rpHostAddress.name: rpHostAddress
rpHostAddress.description: The physical address of this host.

rpHostCreationOrder.name: rpHostCreationOrder
rpHostCreationOrder.description: See hostCreationOrder in the RMON MIB.

rpHostIndex.name: rpHostIndex
rpHostIndex.description: See hostIndex in the RMON MIB.

rpHostProtocols.name: rpHostProtocols
rpHostProtocols.description: A bit array where each bit indicates a protocol that was seen in a good packet transmitted by that host. The protocols currently monitored are: Bit Protocol 2^0 Unrecognized protocol (none of the following) 2^1 Internet (IP, ARP, RARP) 2^2 ISO 2^3 DEC 2^4 NetWare 2^5 AppleTalk (AppleTalk, AppleTalk ARP) 2^6 XNS 2^7 SNA 2^8 VINES 2^9 NetBEUI 2^10 Media Access Control A value of 0 means that no transmission has been registered.

rpHostFirstTransmit.name: rpHostFirstTransmit
rpHostFirstTransmit.description: The value of sysUpTime when the first good transmission by this host occurred. If this value is 0 and the hostOutPkts count is 0 then the host has not yet transmitted.

rpHostLastTransmit.name: rpHostLastTransmit
rpHostLastTransmit.description: The value of sysUpTime when the most recent transmission by this host occurred.

rpHostTimeTable.name: rpHostTimeTable
rpHostTimeTable.description: A list of host entries that extends the RMON MIB.

rpHostTimeEntry.name: rpHostTimeEntry
rpHostTimeEntry.description: A collection of statistics that extend the host entries in RMON.

rpHostTimeAddress.name: rpHostTimeAddress
rpHostTimeAddress.description: The physical address of this host.

rpHostTimeCreationOrder.name: rpHostTimeCreationOrder
rpHostTimeCreationOrder.description: See hostTimeCreationOrder in the RMON MIB.

rpHostTimeIndex.name: rpHostTimeIndex
rpHostTimeIndex.description: See hostIndex in the RMON MIB.

rpHostTimeProtocols.name: rpHostTimeProtocols
rpHostTimeProtocols.description: A bit array where each bit indicates a protocol that was seen in a good packet transmitted by that host. The protocols currently monitored are: Bit Protocol 2^0 Unrecognized protocol (none of the following) 2^1 Internet (IP, ARP, RARP) 2^2 ISO 2^3 DEC 2^4 NetWare 2^5 AppleTalk (AppleTalk, AppleTalk ARP) 2^6 XNS 2^7 SNA 2^8 VINES 2^9 NetBEUI 2^10 Media Access Control A value of 0 means that no transmission has been registered.

rpHostTimeFirstTransmit.name: rpHostTimeFirstTransmit
rpHostTimeFirstTransmit.description: The value of sysUpTime when the first good transmission by this host occurred. If this value is 0 and the hostOutPkts count is 0 then the host has not yet transmitted.

rpHostTimeLastTransmit.name: rpHostTimeLastTransmit
rpHostTimeLastTransmit.description: The value of sysUpTime when the most recent transmission by this host occurred.

rpMatrixSDTable.name: rpMatrixSDTable
rpMatrixSDTable.description: A list of matrix entries that extends the RMON MIB.

rpMatrixSDEntry.name: rpMatrixSDEntry
rpMatrixSDEntry.description: A collection of statistics that extend the matrix entries in RMON.

rpMatrixSDIndex.name: rpMatrixSDIndex
rpMatrixSDIndex.description: See matrixSDIndex in the RMON MIB.

rpMatrixSDProtocols.name: rpMatrixSDProtocols
rpMatrixSDProtocols.description: A bit array where each bit indicates a protocol that was seen in a good packet transmitted from rpMatrixSDSourceAddress to rpMatrixSDDestAddress. The protocols currently monitored are: Bit Protocol 2^0 Unrecognized protocol (none of the following) 2^1 Internet (IP, ARP, RARP) 2^2 ISO 2^3 DEC 2^4 NetWare 2^5 AppleTalk (AppleTalk, AppleTalk ARP) 2^6 XNS 2^7 SNA 2^8 VINES 2^9 NetBEUI 2^10 Media Access Control

rpMatrixSDFirstTransmit.name: rpMatrixSDFirstTransmit
rpMatrixSDFirstTransmit.description: The value of sysUpTime when the first good transmission from rpMatrixSDSourceAddress to rpMatrixSDDestAddress occurred.

rpMatrixSDLastTransmit.name: rpMatrixSDLastTransmit
rpMatrixSDLastTransmit.description: The value of sysUpTime when the most recent transmission from rpMatrixSDSourceAddress to rpMatrixSDDestAddress occurred.

rpMatrixDSTable.name: rpMatrixDSTable
rpMatrixDSTable.description: A list of matrix entries that extends the RMON MIB.

rpMatrixDSEntry.name: rpMatrixDSEntry
rpMatrixDSEntry.description: A collection of statistics that extend the matrix entries in RMON.

rpMatrixDSIndex.name: rpMatrixDSIndex
rpMatrixDSIndex.description: See matrixDSIndex in the RMON MIB.

rpMatrixDSProtocols.name: rpMatrixDSProtocols
rpMatrixDSProtocols.description: A bit array where each bit indicates a protocol that was seen in a good packet transmitted from rpMatrixDSSourceAddress to rpMatrixDSDestAddress. The protocols currently monitored are: Bit Protocol 2^0 Unrecognized protocol (none of the following) 2^1 Internet (IP, ARP, RARP) 2^2 ISO 2^3 DEC 2^4 NetWare 2^5 AppleTalk (AppleTalk, AppleTalk ARP) 2^6 XNS 2^7 SNA 2^8 VINES 2^9 NetBEUI 2^10 Media Access Control

rpMatrixDSFirstTransmit.name: rpMatrixDSFirstTransmit
rpMatrixDSFirstTransmit.description: The value of sysUpTime when the first good transmission from rpMatrixDSSourceAddress to rpMatrixDSDestAddress occurred.

rpMatrixDSLastTransmit.name: rpMatrixDSLastTransmit
rpMatrixDSLastTransmit.description: The value of sysUpTime when the most recent transmission from rpMatrixDSSourceAddress to rpMatrixDSDestAddress occurred.

rpFilterTable.name: rpFilterTable
rpFilterTable.description: A list of filter entries that extends the RMON MIB.

rpFilterEntry.name: rpFilterEntry
rpFilterEntry.description: A collection of objects that extend the filter entries in RMON.

rpFilterIndex.name: rpFilterIndex
rpFilterIndex.description: See filterIndex in the RMON MIB.

rpFilterProtocols.name: rpFilterProtocols
rpFilterProtocols.description: This object is a bit mask that identifies the protocol suite(s) that match this filter. The currently defined bits are: Bit Protocol 2^0 Unrecognized protocol (none of the following) 2^1 Internet (IP, ARP, RARP) 2^2 ISO 2^3 DEC 2^4 NetWare 2^5 AppleTalk (AppleTalk, AppleTalk ARP) 2^6 XNS 2^7 SNA 2^8 VINES 2^9 NetBEUI 2^10 Media Access Control The default is -1 (all bits set) which means match any protocol. This object may not be modified if the associated filterStatus is equal to valid(1).

rpChannelTable.name: rpChannelTable
rpChannelTable.description: A list of channel entries that extends the RMON MIB.

rpChannelEntry.name: rpChannelEntry
rpChannelEntry.description: A collection of objects that extend the channel entries in the RMON MIB.

rpChannelIndex.name: rpChannelIndex
rpChannelIndex.description: See channelIndex in the RMON MIB.

rpChannelMatchOctets.name: rpChannelMatchOctets
rpChannelMatchOctets.description: The number of octets (excluding framing bits but including FCS octets) in packets which increment the channelMatches object in the RMON MIB.

rpChannelControlBufferFull.name: rpChannelControlBufferFull
rpChannelControlBufferFull.description: When this object is set to 1 and the bufferControlFullStatus is full and the bufferControlFullAction is set to lockWhenFull, this channel will stop monitoring the incomming packet.

rpBufferControlTable.name: rpBufferControlTable
rpBufferControlTable.description: A list of buffer entries that extends the RMON MIB.

rpBufferControlEntry.name: rpBufferControlEntry
rpBufferControlEntry.description: A collection of objects that extend the buffer entries in the RMON MIB.

rpBufferControlIndex.name: rpBufferControlIndex
rpBufferControlIndex.description: See bufferControlIndex in the RMON MIB.

rpBufferCaptureOctets.name: rpBufferCaptureOctets
rpBufferCaptureOctets.description: The number of octets (excluding framing bits but including FCS octets and overhead) in packets which are captured in the buffer.

rpAdminSerialNumber.name: rpAdminSerialNumber
rpAdminSerialNumber.description: An ASCII string specifying the serial number for this probe.

rpAdminProbeCopies.name: rpAdminProbeCopies
rpAdminProbeCopies.description: The number of copies of a probe with rpAdminSerialNumber that can reside on a network. A value of 0 means unlimited copies.

rpHostMonitorControlTable.name: rpHostMonitorControlTable
rpHostMonitorControlTable.description: A list of host monitor table control entries.

rpHostMonitorControlEntry.name: rpHostMonitorControlEntry
rpHostMonitorControlEntry.description: A list of parameters used to monitor the activity of a host.

rpHostMonitorControlIndex.name: rpHostMonitorControlIndex
rpHostMonitorControlIndex.description: An index that uniquely identifies an entry in the rpHostMonitorControlTable.

rpHostMonitorControlHostIndex.name: rpHostMonitorControlHostIndex
rpHostMonitorControlHostIndex.description: The host table identified by a particular value of this index is associated with the same host table as identified by the same value of hostIndex. This object may not be modified if the associated rpHostMonitorControlStatus is equal to valid(1).

rpHostMonitorControlActiveEvent.name: rpHostMonitorControlActiveEvent
rpHostMonitorControlActiveEvent.description: The index of the eventEntry that is used when a host monitor entry goes from inactive to active. This object may not be modified if the associated rpHostMonitorControlStatus is equal to valid(1).

rpHostMonitorControlInactiveEvent.name: rpHostMonitorControlInactiveEvent
rpHostMonitorControlInactiveEvent.description: The index of the eventEntry that is used when a host monitor entry goes from active to inactive. This object may not be modified if the associated rpHostMonitorControlStatus is equal to valid(1).

rpHostMonitorControlTimeout.name: rpHostMonitorControlTimeout
rpHostMonitorControlTimeout.description: The amount of time in minutes a host is allowed to be inactive before it is reported to be dead via an rpHostInactive trap. Subsequent traps will not be sent for the same host until the host has transmitted a packet and timed-out again. A value of 0 disables the monitoring of this table.

rpHostMonitorControlOwner.name: rpHostMonitorControlOwner
rpHostMonitorControlOwner.description: The entity that configured this entry and is therefore using the resources assigned to it.

rpHostMonitorEntry.name: rpHostMonitorEntry
rpHostMonitorEntry.description: A collection of information used to monitor a host for activity.

rpHostMonitorIndex.name: rpHostMonitorIndex
rpHostMonitorIndex.description: The host table identified by a particular value of this index is associated wth the same host table as identified by the same value of hostMonitorControlIndex.

rpHostMonitorAddress.name: rpHostMonitorAddress
rpHostMonitorAddress.description: The physical address of the monitored host.

rpHostMonitorActivity.name: rpHostMonitorActivity
rpHostMonitorActivity.description: The state of the monitored host, initially set to active(1). If an active(1) host has not transmitted for rpHostMonitorControlTimeout minutes then the state changes to inactive(2). If an inactive(2) host transmits the state changes to active(1).

rpHostMonitorAddDelete.name: rpHostMonitorAddDelete
rpHostMonitorAddDelete.description: Writing add(1) to this variable will add the host specified by the rpHostMonitorAddress index to this rpHostMonitorTable. Writing delete(2) will delete the host specified by the rpHostMonitorAddress index. This object may not be modified if the associated rpHostMonitorControlStatus is not equal to valid(1).

rpDuplicateIpTable.name: rpDuplicateIpTable
rpDuplicateIpTable.description: A list of IP addresses that have duplicate physical address.

rpDuplicateIpEntry.name: rpDuplicateIpEntry
rpDuplicateIpEntry.description: A list of parameters defining an IP address with duplicate physical addresses.

rpDuplicateIpNewMAC.name: rpDuplicateIpNewMAC
rpDuplicateIpNewMAC.description: The latest physical address associated with the IP address in rpDuplicateIPAddress.

rpDuplicateIpOldMAC.name: rpDuplicateIpOldMAC
rpDuplicateIpOldMAC.description: The previous physical address associated with the IP address in rpDuplicateIPAddress.

rpDuplicateIpTimestamp.name: rpDuplicateIpTimestamp
rpDuplicateIpTimestamp.description: The value of sysUpTime when this entry was last added or updated in the table.

rpMacToIpTable.name: rpMacToIpTable
rpMacToIpTable.description: A list of host and IP address pairs.

rpMacToIpEntry.name: rpMacToIpEntry
rpMacToIpEntry.description: A record defining a host and IP address pair.

rpMacToIpHostIndex.name: rpMacToIpHostIndex
rpMacToIpHostIndex.description: The host table of which this entry is a part.

rpMacToIpMACAddress.name: rpMacToIpMACAddress
rpMacToIpMACAddress.description: The physical address of this host.

rpMacToIpIPAddress.name: rpMacToIpIPAddress
rpMacToIpIPAddress.description: The IP address of this host.

risingAlarm.name: risingAlarm
risingAlarm.description: The SNMP trap that is generated when an alarm entry crosses its rising threshold and generates an event that is configured for sending SNMP traps.

fallingAlarm.name: fallingAlarm
fallingAlarm.description: The SNMP trap that is generated when an alarm entry crosses its falling threshold and generates an event that is configured for sending SNMP traps.

packetMatch.name: packetMatch
packetMatch.description: The SNMP trap that is generated when a packet is captured by a channel that is configured for sending SNMP traps.

rpHostActive.name: rpHostActive
rpHostActive.description: This trap is generated whenever the probe first detects that a monitored inactive host has begun transmitting again.

rpHostInactive.name: rpHostInactive
rpHostInactive.description: This trap is generated whenever the probe first detects that a monitored active host has not transmitted for the specified interval rpHostMonitorControlTimeout.

rpDuplicateIpAddr.name: rpDuplicateIpAddr
rpDuplicateIpAddr.description: This trap is generated when the probe detects that a host is using an IP address used by another host(s) and the IP address is not in the associated duplicate IP table.
